release.description: This release of the Model Ontology is a component of the integrated release 7.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Three model files are updated in this release: "UpperModel.pins", "UpperModel.pont", "dd11179.pins"
CCB approved changes: CCB-171 - Split hardware-compatible ASCII numeric types from the unbounded.
SIP_Deep_Archive - steward:NSSDCA - The values and value meanings for "SIP_Deep_Archive.provider_site_id" were added.
SIP_Deep_Archive - steward:NSSDCA - The value “MD5Deep 4.n” and its value meaning for "Information_Package_Component_Deep_Archive.checksum_type", was added.
SIP_Deep_Archive - steward:NSSDCA - Added schematron rule to Product_SIP_Deep_Archive to validate that both Internal_Reference and lidvid_reference are required.
Property Maps – The attributes property_map_type and property_map_subtype were moved from pdroperty_maps to property_map_entry.
JSON File – Added Association to provide link (generalization) for a SuperClass. Added assocType {attribute_of, component_of, parent_of}.

release.description: This release of the Model Ontology represents a point build of this component.
This release of the Model Ontology is a component of the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
